mapper.select: select t1.COLUMN_ID as "columnId", t1.COLUMN_NAME as "columnName", t1.DATA_TYPE as "dataType", t2.COMMENTS as "comments", t1.DATA_LENGTH as "dataLength", t1.NULLABLE as "nullable", t1.DATA_PRECISION as "dataPrecision", t1.DATA_SCALE as "dataScale" from all_tab_columns t1, user_col_comments t2 where t1.table_name = 'T_SES_BIN_USEFUL' and t2.TABLE_NAME = 'T_SES_BIN_USEFUL' and t1.COLUMN_NAME = t2.COLUMN_NAME order by t1.COLUMN_ID asc
